text: Prayascita garneharu, upasana garneharu, (allahako) prasansa garneharu, upavasa basneharu, (athava satmargama yatra garneharu) ruku'a garneharu, dhoganeharu satkarmako upadesa dineharu ra duskarmabata rokneharu, allahaka simaharuko (allahale nirdharita gareko sima) raksa garneharu (momina hun), ra he muham'mada mominaharula'i svargako subhasandesa suna'idinus
